sentence: According to GuruFocus Insider Data, the recent chief financial officer sells were Vertex Pharmaceuticals Inc. ( VRTX ), Salesforce.com Inc. ( CRM ) and Amphenol Corp. ( APH ).
Executive Vice President, CFO and Chief Operating Offier Ian F. Smith sold 98,553 shares for an average price of $124 per share on June 1.
Since then, the stock price has increased 0.8%.
Vertex Pharmaceuticals has a market cap of $31.13 billion and its shares were traded around $124.99.
The company has a price-earnings (P/E) ratio of 178.56 and a price-sales (P/S) ratio of 15.24.
Vertex announced its first-quarter results with revenue of $714.72 million and gross profit of $667.73 million, while the net income was $247.76 million.
The 2016 total revenue was $1.7 billion, a 65% increase from 2015.
The 2016 gross profit was $1.49 billion, a 64% increase from the year prior.
The 2016 net loss was $112.05 million.

The stock price since then has declined 2.69%.

Since then, the stock price has increased 0.75%.
Salesforce has a market cap of $65.09 billion and its shares were traded around $91.39.
The company has a P/E ratio of 481 and P/S ratio of 7.23.
Over the past 10 years, the company had an annual average earnings growth of 17%.

The 2016 total revenue was $8.39 billion, a 26% increase from 2015.
The 2016 gross profit was $6.16 billion, a 23% increase from a year ago.
The 2016 net income was $179.63 million.

The stock price has not changed since then.

On June 6, co-founder Parker Harris sold 8,027 shares for an average price of $91.54.
The stock price has fallen 0.16% since then.
Senior Vice President and CFO Craig A. Lampo sold 15,000 shares for an average price of $72.86 per share on May 17.
Since then, the stock price has increased 4.2%.
Amphenol has a market cap of $23.2 billion and its shares were traded around $75.92.
The company has a P/E ratio of 26.92 and P/S ratio of 3.75.
The trailing 12-month dividend yield is 0.79%, and the forward dividend yield is 0.85%.

Amphenol announced its first-quarter results with revenue of $1.56 billion and gross profit of $515.9 million, while the net income was $224.9 million.
The 2016 total revenue was $6.29 billion, a 13% increase from 2015.
The 2016 gross profit was $2.04 billion, a 15% increase from the previous year.
The 2016 net income was $822.9 million.
On May 15, President and CEO Richard Adam Norwitt sold 200,000 shares for an average price of $73.1.
The stock price since then has increased 3.86%.

The stock price has increased by 3.86% since then.
On June 2, Vice President and Group General Manager Martin Booker sold 46,000 shares for an average price of $75.42.
